faqs.question: This is an example FAQ, this will show what the FAQ can do
faqs.answer:
# Welcome to our FAQ System!

[info]Our FAQ system supports rich formatting, interactive elements, and version tracking![/info]

## Core Features

1. Rich text formatting with **bold**, *italic*, and ~~strikethrough~~
2. Code blocks with `inline code` and ```larger code blocks```
3. Interactive elements and collapsible sections
4. Version history tracking
5. Smart search functionality

## Callout Types
[info]Information callouts for helpful tips[/info]
[warning]Warning callouts for important notices[/warning]
[note]Note callouts for additional context[/note]

## Interactive Elements
[details]Click to see hidden content|• Lists and formatting inside collapsible sections
• [color:blue]Colored text highlights[/color]
• Nested formatting support
• And much more!
[/details]

## Image Support
Default image:
[image]https://neoneko.xyz/images/logo.jpg[/image]

Custom size (200x200):
[image:200:200]https://neoneko.xyz/images/logo.jpg[/image]

## Links
[link]https://neoneko.xyz|Custom link format[/link]
or [Markdown style](https://neoneko.xyz)

> Blockquotes for highlighting important information or quotes

## Data Tables
|Feature|Description|
|Formatting|Rich text support|
|Images|Size control|
|Search|Keyword-based|
|History|Version tracking|

history.changes: Updated examples and added version tracking

faqs.question: Can I see more formatting examples?
faqs.answer:
# Advanced Formatting Guide

## Text Styling
• Regular text for normal content
• **Bold text** for strong emphasis
• *Italic text* for subtle emphasis
• ~~Strikethrough~~ for outdated content
• [color:red]Red text[/color] for attention
• [color:#64ffda]Custom color[/color] using hex codes

## Code Examples
`inline code` for short snippets
```
function example() {
    return 'larger code blocks';
}
```

## Lists
1. Ordered lists
2. With automatic numbering
3. And proper spacing

• Unordered lists
• Using bullet points
• For better organization

## Blockquotes
> Single line quotes look like this

> Multi-line blockquotes
> Can span multiple lines
> With proper formatting

## Advanced Tables
|Header 1|Header 2|Header 3|
|Left|Center|Right|
|Data|More|Content|

## Interactive Sections
[details]Advanced Features|Inside collapsible sections you can use:
• All formatting options
• [color:blue]Colored text[/color]
• Lists and tables
• Even nested details!
[/details]

## Callout Variations
[info]Information callouts support
• Multiple lines
• Formatting
• And more[/info]

[warning]Warning callouts
With multiple lines
And proper spacing[/warning]

[note]Notes can include:
• Important details
• Additional context
• Key information[/note]
